summary.span: 执行一个操作之前检查是否有足够的内存资源。

span.span: Checks for sufficient memory resources before executing an operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!NOTE] > 此类用于高级开发。This class is intended for use in advanced development. 创建实例的类创建内存入口。Creating an instance of the class creates a memory gate. 启动一个需要大量内存的活动之前，内存入口检查有足够的资源。A memory gate checks for sufficient resources before initiating an activity that requires a large amount of memory. 在检查失败会导致所引发异常。Failing the check results in an exception being thrown. 此异常可防止从正在启动的操作，并减少因发生故障的可能性缺少资源。This exception prevents an operation from being started and reduces the possibility of failure due to lack of resources. 利用此，您会降低性能，以避免异常并在代码中的任意位置中的异常处理不当，可能会导致任何状态损坏。This enables you decrease performance to avoid an exception and any state corruption that may result from improper handling of the exception in arbitrary locations in your code. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此类型实现接口。This type implements the interface. 在使用完类型后，您应直接或间接释放类型。When you have finished using the type, you should dispose of it either directly or indirectly. 若要直接释放类型，调用其中的方法`try` / `catch`块。To dispose of the type directly, call its method in a `try`/`catch` block. 若要间接释放类型，请使用 `using`（在 C# 中）或 `Using`（在 Visual Basic 中）等语言构造。To dispose of it indirectly, use a language construct such as `using` (in C#) or `Using` (in Visual Basic). 有关详细信息，请参阅中的"使用对象实现 IDisposable"一节接口主题。For more information, see the "Using an Object that Implements IDisposable" section in the interface topic. 通过引发异常，应用程序可以区分操作将不能完成的评估和部分已完成的操作可能已破坏应用程序状态。By throwing an exception, an application can distinguish between an estimate that an operation will not be able to complete and a partially completed operation that may have corrupted the application state. 这允许应用程序在保守式升级策略，这可能需要卸载当前的频率减少或回收进程。This allows an application to reduce the frequency of a pessimistic escalation policy, which may require unloading the current or recycling the process. 检查是否有足够的内存和连续虚拟地址空间均位于所有垃圾回收堆，并且还可能增加交换文件的大小。 checks to see whether sufficient memory and consecutive virtual address space are available in all garbage collection heaps, and may increase the size of the swap file. 使始终应使用的入口，但调用方的生存期内长期内存可用性的任何保证方法，以确保与关联的资源发布。 makes no guarantees regarding the long-term availability of the memory during the lifetime of the gate, but callers should always use the method to ensure that resources associated with are released. 若要使用的内存入口，必须创建对象，并指定兆字节 (MB) 的内存数量的下一步操作应使用。To use a memory gate, you must create a object and specify the number of megabytes (MB) of memory that the next operation is expected to use. 如果没有足够内存可用，引发异常。If enough memory is not available, an exception is thrown. 构造函数的参数必须为正整数。The parameter of the constructor must be a positive integer. 负值引发异常。A negative value raises an exception. 在 16 MB 的粒度进行操作。 operates at a granularity of 16 MB. 任何小于 16 MB 的值作为 16 MB，处理和其他值被视为下一个最大 16 MB 的倍数。Any values smaller than 16 MB are treated as 16 MB, and other values are treated as the next largest multiple of 16 MB. ## Examples 使应用程序变慢本身以避免耗尽内存损坏的方式。 enables an application to slow itself to avoid running out of memory in a corrupting manner. 它应词法范围内使用。It should be used within a lexical scope. 下面的示例将启动线程来处理工作队列中的项。The following example launches threads to process items in a work queue. 每个线程启动之前，请使用检查可用的内存资源。Before each thread is launched, the available memory resources are checked using . 如果引发异常，main 方法等待，直到有可用的内存启动下一个线程之前。If an exception is thrown, the main method waits until memory is available before launching the next thread. [!code-csharp[MemoryFailPoint#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemoryFailPoint/CS/program.cs#1)]

permission.span: 用于调用非托管的代码。

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(int32 sizeInMegabytes) cil managed

param.name: sizeInMegabytes
param.span: 需要的内存大小（以兆字节为单位）。

span.span: The required memory size, in megabytes.
This must be a positive value.

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例，指定成功执行所需的内存量。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class, specifying the amount of memory required for successful execution.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以根据经验确定你的应用程序用来处理工作项的内存量。The amount of memory used by your application to process a work item can be determined empirically. 若要估算你的应用程序需要处理请求的内存量，请考虑使用方法，以确定量的内存可用之前和之后调用的方法处理工作项。To estimate the amount of memory your application needs to process a request, consider using the method to determine the amount of memory available before and after calling the method that processes the work item. 请参阅类的代码示例，动态确定的值为`sizeInMegabytes`参数。See the class for a code example that dynamically determines the value for the `sizeInMegabytes` parameter. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何确定某个方法要求在执行时的内存量。The following example demonstrates how to determine the amount of memory a method requires when executing. 此代码示例是为提供一个更大示例的一部分类。This code example is part of a larger example provided for the class. [!code-csharp[MemoryFailPoint#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR/MemoryFailPoint/CS/program.cs#2)]

exception.span: 指定的内存大小为负数。

span.span: The specified memory size is negative.

exception.span: 没有足够的内存来开始执行由门保护的代码。

span.span: There is insufficient memory to begin execution of the code protected by the gate.

permission.span: 直接调用方需要完全信任。

span.span: requires full trust for the immediate caller.

permission.span: 不能由部分受信任的或透明的代码使用此成员。

span.span: This member cannot be used by partially trusted or transparent code.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void Dispose() cil managed
abstract member Dispose : unit -> unit override this.Dispose : unit -> unit

summary.span: 释放由 使用的所有资源。

span.span: Releases all resources used by the .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在完成使用 后，应调用 。Call when you are finished using the . 方法使 处于不可用状态。The method leaves the in an unusable state. 在调用，必须释放对所有引用这样垃圾回收器才能收回内存的占用。After calling , you must release all references to the so the garbage collector can reclaim the memory that the was occupying. 有关详细信息，请参阅[清理了非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)并[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。For more information, see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md). > [!NOTE] > 每次释放对 的最后一个引用前，均应调用 。Always call before you release your last reference to the . 否则，在垃圾回收器调用 对象的 `Finalize` 方法之前，该对象正在使用的资源不会被释放。Otherwise, the resources it is using will not be freed until the garbage collector calls the object's `Finalize` method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Finalize() cil managed

summary.span: 确保垃圾回收器回收 对象时释放资源并执行其他清理操作。

span.span: Ensures that resources are freed and other cleanup operations are performed when the garbage collector reclaims the object.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 垃圾回收器调用方法时当前对象是即将完成。The garbage collector calls the method when the current object is ready to be finalized.
